i hear,
   
  matched boxes is online
  i know that doest make too much sense
  Charm

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           I bought two wood boxes at Hobby Lobby Saturday. Of course the front panel is proving to be a challenge, I wanted it wood too, so I'm using 1/8 inch mahogany plywood--ever try to drill speaker gril holes without splintering the wood!? I don't know why they wood(pun intended) say it's on time.  I like this kind of voice, the profoundness is in the simplicity. 
 
 Frank-S
